entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
